oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Can one control the vibrations of a drum?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHANKAR, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: systems
hyperbolic equations
feedback stability
causality
input-output structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper considers the problem of constructing feedback stabilizing controllers for the wave operator on R-n (more generally AR systems determined by a hyperbolic operator). In order to accomplish this, it must first clarify the notion of an input-output structure on a distributed system, as well as what it means to interconnect two such systems. Both these notions are shown to be consequences of a structure which generalizes the standard causal structure of lumped systems determined by the flow of time. Given this apparatus, the paper then constructs feedback controllers which stabilize the wave equation along directions given by a proper cone in R-n.
